verses.verse: The <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4100>him,<s%> "Why have you <S%H6213>treated<s%> us <S%H1697>this<s%> <S%H4100>way,<s%> that you <S%H7121>didn't<s%> call <S%H1980>us,<s%> when you went to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H4080>Midian?<s%>" They rebuked him <S%H2394>sharply.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6213>them,<s%> "What have I now done in comparison with <S%H5955>you?<s%> Isn't the gleaning of the grapes of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H1210>vintage<s%> of <S%H44>Abiezer?<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb!<s%> What was I <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> in comparison with <S%H7307>you?<s%>" Then their anger was <S%H7503>abated<s%> toward <S%H1697>him,<s%> when he had said <S%H1696>that.<s%>

<S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>over,<s%> <S%H7969>he,<s%> and the three <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who were with <S%H5889>him,<s%> faint, yet <S%H7291>pursuing.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> "Please <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3603>loaves<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H7272>follow<s%> <S%H5889>me;<s%> for they are faint, and I am <S%H7291>pursuing<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna,<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>"

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Are the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> now in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that we should <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> to your <S%H6635>army?<s%>"

<S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Therefore when <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> into my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> then I will <S%H1758>tear<s%> your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with the <S%H6975>thorns<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and with <S%H1303>briers.<s%>"

He went <S%H5927>up<s%> there to <S%H6439>Penuel,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them in the <S%H2063>same<s%> <S%H582>way;<s%> and the men of <S%H6439>Penuel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him as the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%> had <S%H6030>answered.<s%>

He <S%H559>spoke<s%> also to the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6439>Penuel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "When I come <S%H7725>again<s%> in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> I will break <S%H5422>down<s%> this <S%H4026>tower.<s%>"

Now <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> were in <S%H7174>Karkor,<s%> and their <S%H4264>armies<s%> with <S%H2568>them,<s%> about fifteen <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3498>men,<s%> all who were left of all the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east;<s%> for there <S%H5307>fell<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H8025>drew<s%> <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

<S%H1439>Gideon<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of those who <S%H7931>lived<s%> in <S%H168>tents<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> of <S%H5025>Nobah<s%> and <S%H3011>Jogbehah,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H4264>army;<s%> for the <S%H4264>army<s%> was <S%H983>secure.<s%>

<S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> <S%H5127>fled;<s%> and he <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3920>them;<s%> and he took the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna,<s%> and <S%H2729>confused<s%> all the <S%H4264>army.<s%>
<S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H4608>from<s%> the ascent of <S%H2775>Heres.<s%>

He <S%H3920>caught<s%> a young <S%H5288>man<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> and <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H3789>him:<s%> and he described for him the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> and its <S%H2205>elders,<s%> <S%H7657>seventy-seven<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

He <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "See <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna,<s%> concerning whom you <S%H2778>taunted<s%> <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, <S%H3709><s%> 'Are the hands of <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> now in your <S%H3709>hand,<s%> that we should <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> to your <S%H582>men<s%> who are <S%H3287>weary?<s%>'"

He <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H6975>thorns<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and <S%H1303>briers,<s%> and with them he <S%H3045>taught<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth.<s%>
He broke <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H6439>Penuel,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna,<s%> <S%H375>"What<s%> kind of <S%H582>men<s%> were they whom you <S%H2026>killed<s%> at <S%H8396>Tabor?<s%>" They <S%H559>answered,<s%> "They were like <S%H3644>you.<s%> Each <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8389>resembled<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of a <S%H4428>king.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "They were my <S%H251>brothers,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of my <S%H517>mother.<s%> As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H3863>if<s%> you had saved them <S%H2421>alive,<s%> I would not kill <S%H2026>you.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3500>Jether<s%> his <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> "Get <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H5288>them!<s%>" But the youth <S%H8025>didn't<s%> draw his <S%H2719>sword;<s%> for he was <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> because he was yet a <S%H5288>youth.<s%>

Then <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>"Rise<s%> and <S%H6293>fall<s%> on <S%H376>us;<s%> for as the man <S%H1369>is,<s%> so is his strength." <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7720>crescents<s%> that were on their <S%H1581>camels<s%>' <S%H6677>necks.<s%>

Then the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> <S%H4910>"Rule<s%> over <S%H1121>us,<s%> both you, and your son, and your <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3467>also;<s%> for you have saved us out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>"

<S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4910>them,<s%> "I will not rule over <S%H1121>you,<s%> neither shall my son <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H3068>you.<s%> Yahweh shall rule over <S%H4910>you.<s%>"

<S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7592>them,<s%> "I would make a <S%H7596>request<s%> of <S%H5414>you,<s%> that you would give me every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H5141>earrings<s%> of his <S%H7998>spoil.<s%>" (For they had <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>earrings,<s%> because they were <S%H3459>Ishmaelites.<s%>)

They <S%H559>answered,<s%> "We will <S%H5414>willingly<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H6566>them.<s%>" They spread a <S%H8071>garment,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7993>threw<s%> the <S%H5141>earrings<s%> of his spoil into <S%H7998>it.<s%>

The <S%H4948>weight<s%> of the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>earrings<s%> that he <S%H7592>requested<s%> was one <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> besides the <S%H7720>crescents,<s%> and the <S%H5188>pendants,<s%> and the <S%H713>purple<s%> <S%H899>clothing<s%> that was on the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and besides the <S%H6060>chains<s%> that were about their <S%H1581>camels<s%>' <S%H6677>necks.<s%>

<S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H3322>it,<s%> and put it in his <S%H5892>city,<s%> even in <S%H6084>Ophrah:<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> it <S%H4170>there;<s%> and it became a snare to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> and to his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

So <S%H4080>Midian<s%> was <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%> no <S%H3254>more.<s%> The <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1439>Gideon.<s%>
<S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>
<S%H1439>Gideon<s%> had <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3318>conceived<s%> from his <S%H3409>body;<s%> for he had <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H802>wives.<s%>
His <S%H6370>concubine<s%> who was in <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> she also <S%H3205>bore<s%> him a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and he <S%H7760>named<s%> <S%H8034>him<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>

<S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in a <S%H2896>good<s%> old <S%H7872>age,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H6913>tomb<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> in <S%H6084>Ophrah<s%> of the <S%H33>Abiezrites.<s%>

It <S%H1439>happened,<s%> as soon as Gideon was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> turned <S%H7725>again,<s%> and played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1168>Baals,<s%> and <S%H7760>made<s%> Baal <S%H1170>Berith<s%> their <S%H430>god.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2142>didn't<s%> remember <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> who had <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of all their <S%H341>enemies<s%> on every <S%H5439>side;<s%>

neither did they <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal,<s%> <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> according to all the <S%H2896>goodness<s%> which he had <S%H6213>shown<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
